replies.body: Post your best teemo kills pls

OK so here is meh story. {{champion:16}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:22}} were all watching closely as the other team was making final selections. The sweat was rolling down their foreheads as their team picked up {{champion:74}} and called mid. This was like any other Bronze V match. Then whatever hellspawn that was on the other team picked his lord, Satan himself. They locked in {{champion:17}}. As the {{item:3070}} s rolled down their faces, {{champion:74}} adjusted his glasses and calmly said said, "I have a plan, and its simple." the team chat flooded with rage and dispar until he spammed chat with "Listen or I AFk." As the rage quieted down, {{champion:74}} simply said "We kill the Teemo."
Lol that's every Teemo game, global taught too stronk
But the day where they will bring back oracle potion XD

in order to kill {{champion:17}}  you must play {{champion:15}} or {{champion:56}} so you can spell shield or just play{{champion:92}} and you win life
what r u talking about {{champion:17}} is one of {{champion:92}} 's counter
A riven walked into a bar. there was no counter
Touche.
{{champion:114}} Riposte.
All for One - 5x{{champion:17}}  Vs 5x{{champion:122}} . Dunk chains beautiful enough to make a grown man weep from joy, putting so many badgers in the ground.
"Take the best moment in your life and multiply that by 10,000.  You will never know the joy I feel" -Dunkmaster Darius-

i made a nest inbetween the two top lane bushes last night completey surrounded myself with mushrooms waited for thresh and olaf to come gank me the glory of popping out of invis poking one with my q have them chase me and 7 mushrooms go off at once XD.
He's right shroom stacking doesn't increase the dmg it needs to all be separated to deal the most dmg
Even so, it's still pretty funny to watch them all pop and the enemy scream in all chat "FUCK YOU TEEMO"
Whole team wiped including me, enemy pushing for the win where I've planted several shrooms, they all panic after they hit the first one and trigger every single one nearby. Teemo pentakill.
or you could get raptor puff or {{item:3364}} OR BUY PINKS.... srsly why does no one buy pinks even in silver
Riot pls. Put {{item:2047}} back into the Rift (づ｡◕‿‿◕｡)づ
no
Looks like someone didn't play in Season 3... -cough cough- bluegolisano...  -cough cough-
You honestly can't have enough pinks for all the shrooms teemo can place.

My first pentakill was with Teemo.

I had laid shrooms all throughout our jungle. I go a full AP build, not on hit or anything. So I had like 800+ AP. Well, I got caught and started trying to kite the enemy team as my team came to help. The enemy team all followed me into the jungle and I died. However the enemy team started dispersing....right into my shrooms. "An enemy has been slain"..."double kill"..."triple kill"..."quadra kill"...."pentakill." The rage was glorious xD Only penta i've ever seen while the player who got it is dead.
Obviously you've never played {{champion:30}}

My first pentakill ever was on the Devil himself {{champion:17}} and built him AS/AD with a Runaan's, BoRK, and BT. This was late-Season 3 and I was around level 20ish. Easily the most satisfying and fulfilling moment I've had on the Rift.

Old Twisted Treeline.  Full CDR AP {{champion:17}}.  1v3 defending the base, team mates are in position to back door.  Enemy team comes in on the next minion wave.  Team mates start to recall, "no, go, I got this."

12 seconds later.  "ACE".  You do not know despair until you have to walk through an enemy base that is 90% mine field with gaps just big enough for a minion to path down and then be kited into the fountain laser.

We won that game.
It was glorious.

Game Mode Idea: TEEMO
Terrifyingly
Effective
Exploding
Mushrooms
Ofdoom

A mushroom spawns anywhere on the map every 20 seconds and who ever steps on it and anyone within the radius will take 1000 damage each second for 10 seconds.

Every player will go invisible by standing still, Teemo would be disabled from this game mode. (Soz)

What if there was a game mode in which there were no teams and it was an every man for himself and every player started out as a champion. whatever player stepped on the mushroom became teemo with advanced stats and would chase the other players around looking for kiils.
JuggerTeemo
I'd say Offense instead of "ofdoom"
"... frakkin' blowgun." God I love Battle Star Galactica.

Once, whilst playing Gnar, i was getting infuriated at the enemy Teemo, so i walked into a bush and spammed my skills, hoping he'd be in there, waiting for me. To my surprise, not only was he in there, but so was Shaco, and i got a double kill, and laughed for the rest of the day.
